2027400.name: Project: Name
2027400.description:
Project: Name is the ultimate first person jump & run challenge: In three next to impossible levels you will dodge deadly obstacles, run on walls and try to beat the worlds hardest jump & run. This actions filled game is the ultimate challenge for every Gamer.

The rules are simple: don't die too often.

Top Game Elements include:

  • Test your reflexes

  • There is almost no saving!

  • Relaxing original Lo-Fi Music

  • Very tricky parcours

  • Frustration & pain are all inclusive
2027400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
